aka: I am the Earth. Stories from the End of the World

director.name: 梅特·阿尔贝蒂 Maite Alberdi
María Paz González María Paz González

this_title: Soy la Tierra. Historias desde el fin del mundo
trans_title: 我是地球，来自世界尽头的故事
I am the Earth. Stories from the End of the World
introduction: Over 46 minutes, the film takes the viewer on a journey to discover different initiatives and cases where Chileans are contributing to mitigate the effects of climate change, from large-scale projects and scientific innovations to day-to-day citizen actions, all of which are collectively necessary. The focus of this documentary is to show how Chile is contributing to an issue that affects all of humanity, such as climate change, in five thematic areas: sustainable agriculture; forest and biodiversity conservation; renewable energy; the water crisis; and astronomy.源自：https://poff.ee/en/film/environmental-film-programmes-opening-screening-i-am-the-earth-greener-tallinn/
chinese_title: 我是地球，来自世界尽头的故事
foreign_title: Soy la Tierra. Historias desde el fin del mundo
